snippet.textDisplay: Check out Magicmusic6's remix.  He also has more remixes on his channel.  Oh yeah SupraDarky you are effing epic something gargantuan in scope for having such good taste in music!  There are channels that try to mimic what you do but it isn't as spine tingling, head EXPLODINGLY, goose bump inductively, bad ass like your channel.  I compose trance music and drum and bass, I am going to try an ambient track thanks to your influence, and the atmospheric tracks I've heard on your channel!

snippet.textDisplay:
Oh my God... I had totally forgotten about this game, I used to be able to play this game upside down when I was 4...I really loved this game, shame I sold it...

I should buy it again, I'd really like to experience it again, if only for just the nostalgia.

Thank you for reminding me about this game Supra! :)
snippet.textOriginal:
Oh my God... I had totally forgotten about this game, I used to be able to play this game upside down when I was 4...I really loved this game, shame I sold it...

I should buy it again, I'd really like to experience it again, if only for just the nostalgia.

Thank you for reminding me about this game Supra! :)

snippet.textDisplay:
I THINK I WOULDN'T ACKNOWLEDGE IT'S EXISTENCE IF IT WERE THAT BAD HINT HINT.
Also, it's not good to say something is good or bad simply based on looking at it. For all you know you may hate some ultra popular game and you may actually like an extremely hated game. Some people enjoy Sonic 06 for example. Can't really judge unless you've actually tried it yourself.
All joking aside, I know what that game is, I've played it, and it's horrible. It's not Bomberman. I don't believe it actually exists.
snippet.textOriginal:
I THINK I WOULDN'T ACKNOWLEDGE IT'S EXISTENCE IF IT WERE THAT BAD HINT HINT.
Also, it's not good to say something is good or bad simply based on looking at it. For all you know you may hate some ultra popular game and you may actually like an extremely hated game. Some people enjoy Sonic 06 for example. Can't really judge unless you've actually tried it yourself.
All joking aside, I know what that game is, I've played it, and it's horrible. It's not Bomberman. I don't believe it actually exists.

What? Silly, no bad Bomberman games exist.

snippet.textDisplay:
I don't care what reviewers say, I still believe the best Bomberman games are the N64 ones, and Generation. Though I do enjoy the Super Bomberman games as well.
Bomberman's always been great in my book and he always will be.
By the way, what's Bomberman: Act Zero?
snippet.textOriginal:
I don't care what reviewers say, I still believe the best Bomberman games are the N64 ones, and Generation. Though I do enjoy the Super Bomberman games as well.
Bomberman's always been great in my book and he always will be.
By the way, what's Bomberman: Act Zero?

snippet.textDisplay: It's completely different than Bomberman 64, so be warned. It's still a great game, but if you loved the gameplay style of Bomberman 64, I'd say buy Bomberman 64: The Second Attack, it's just like the first, but greatly improved.
snippet.textOriginal: It's completely different than Bomberman 64, so be warned. It's still a great game, but if you loved the gameplay style of Bomberman 64, I'd say buy Bomberman 64: The Second Attack, it's just like the first, but greatly improved.
